directions: Mix the Great Northern beans, garbanzo beans, black-eyed peas, artichokes, green onions, tomatoes, and garlic together in a bowl. Toss with the olive oil, balsamic vinegar, parsley, oregano, and black pepper until well mixed. Refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1 (15.5 ounce) can Great Northern beans, drained
1 (13.75 ounce) can marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
title: New Year Three-Bean and Artichoke Salad
